archimate:Requirement.name: BC.2.3.4a: a) include realistic scenarios (involving both business users and IT specialists) to demonstrate that critical business processes can be resumed within predefined timescales (i.e. the timescale beyond which a loss of service would be unacceptable to the organisation)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
